caption.center: CAROL L. LOY, EMPLOYEE, CLAIMANT v. ALCOA, SELF-INSURED EMPLOYER,

court.center: Before the Arkansas Workers' Compensation Commission

opinion.panel: Upon review before the FULL COMMISSION in Little Rock, Pulaski County, Arkansas.
opinion.attorneys:
Claimant represented by the HONORABLE SILAS H. BREWER, JR., Attorney at Law, Little Rock, Arkansas.
Respondent represented by the HONORABLE PHILLIP CARROLL, Attorney at Law, Little Rock, Arkansas.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER This matter comes before the Full Commission on the claimant's motion to defer submission and extend the briefing schedule. After considering the claimant's motion and the respondent's agreement thereto, the claimant's motion is granted.
The Clerk of the Commission is directed to establish another briefing schedule with the claimant's initial brief due forty-five (45) days from the date of this order.
IT IS SO ORDERED.
_______________________________

PAT WEST HUMPHREY, Commissioner
_______________________________ MIKE WILSON, Commissioner
